bio.rehunt.rebase

Class REBASE

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.rehunt.rebase.REBASE

  • public class REBASE
extends java.lang.Object
    Search the restriction enzyme related information using enzyme name from REBASE link_parsrefs.txt.
    Since:
    JDK1.8.0
    Version:
    REHUNT v1.2
    Author:
    Yu-Huei Cheng
